Tissue box as a pencil holder: You can use a tissue box as a pencil holder by cutting off the top and bottom of the box and placing your pencils inside.
Tissue box as a storage container: You can use a tissue box as a storage container for small items such as pens, pencils, and erasers.
Tissue box as a bird feeder: You can use a tissue box as a bird feeder by filling it with bird seed and hanging it from a tree.
Tissue box as a candle holder: You can use a tissue box as a candle holder by placing a candle inside and lighting it.
Tissue box as a coaster: You can use a tissue box as a coaster by placing a glass or cup on top of it.
